Package domein.gebruiker

Class Klant

java.lang.Object
domein.gebruiker.Gebruiker
domein.gebruiker.Klant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Klant extends Gebruiker
Represents an Customer.

This class contains information about a Customer.

    • Klant

      public Klant(Bedrijf bedrijf, String email, String wachtwoord, String naam, boolean isActief, Adres adres, String telefoonnummer)
      Constructs a new Klant with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      bedrijf - the company to which this customer belongs
      email - the email of this customer
      wachtwoord - the password of this customer
      naam - the name of this customer
      isActief - boolean isActive status of this customer
      adres - the Adres object representing this customer's address
      telefoonnummer - the phone number of this customer

  • Method Details

    • getAdres

    • getTelefoonnummer

      public String getTelefoonnummer()

    • setTelefoonnummer

      public void setTelefoonnummer(String telefoonnummer)

      setter for attribute telefoonnummer
      the client telNr should match:

      • ^[\\+]? == Beginning of the string has optional "+" character
      • [(]? == optional "("
      • [0-9]{3} == exactly 3 digits
      • [)]? == optional ")"
      • [-\\s\\.]? == optional "-" whitespace or "."
      • [0-9]{4,6}$ == 4 to 6 digits at the end of the string
      example matches:
      • +123-456-7890
      • (123) 456.7890
      • 123 4567890
      • +1(123)456-789012
      Parameters:
      telefoonnummer - the client phone number
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when phone number is not filled in, null or doesn't match regex

    • getBestellingenPerLeverancier

      public List<Bestelling> getBestellingenPerLeverancier(Gebruiker leverancier)
      This returns a filtered list of orders of this customer
      filtered by supplier == given supplier
      Parameters:
      leverancier - the supplier of orders
      Returns:
      all orders this customer has with the given supplier

    • getOpenstaandeBestellingen

      public List<Bestelling> getOpenstaandeBestellingen(Gebruiker leverancier)
      This returns a filtered list of orders of this customer
      filtering out OrderStatus.GELEVERD enum
      Parameters:
      leverancier - the supplier of orders for this customer
      Returns:
      the filtered list of orders

    • getAantalOpenstaandeBestellingen

      public int getAantalOpenstaandeBestellingen(Gebruiker leverancier)
      This returns the amount of orders this customer has with a supplier
      whose OrderStatus is:
      • OrderStatus.ONDERWEG
      • OrderStatus.AAN_HET_VERWERKEN
      • OrderStatus.GEREGISTREERD
      Parameters:
      leverancier - the supplier of orders for this customer
      Returns:
      the amount of orders for this customer that are still open
